message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE 

This paper is about improving the performance of automatic speech recognition (ASR) systems using neural networks. Specifically, it focuses on the performance gap between LSTM-CTC based systems and hybrid DNNs based systems on domains with limited data. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing and speech recognition. Other likely sub-categories include cs.SD (Sound), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), as these sub-categories also cover topics related to neural networks and machine learning.
